'''Melodic Pedals''' are exploration puzzles found in [[Golden Apple Archipelago/2.8|Golden Apple Archipelago]] during [[Summertime Odyssey]]. Stepping on a series of them in the correct order will awaken a nearby [[Melodic Harp]].

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Melodic Pedals 1.png
|text1 = Step on adjacent Melodic Pedals and light them all up to awaken the Melodic Harp.<br>An awakened Melodic Harp will {{Color|help|give off a unique radiance}}.

|image2 = Tutorial Melodic Pedals 2.png
|text2 = Some Melodic Pedals have {{Color|help|special functions}}. You can tell these apart by the special symbols that they are marked by.
}}
